airin.name: Bouclier d'Airain
airin.special_effect: Gives the character a second life when he dies.

excalibur.name: Excalibur, l'épée des Rois
excalibur.special_effect: Gives a huge attack buff to characters with a great destiny... Deals magic damage.

bague_controle.name: Bague de Contrôle des Lames
bague_controle.special_effect: Gives the holder immunity to physical attacks.

bague_loth.name: Bague du Roi Loth
bague_loth.special_effect: Every 3 auto-attacks, the holder launch lightnings dealing magic damage.

saint_suaire.name: Saint suaire
saint_suaire.special_effect: During the first 5 seconds, the holder is immune to auto-attacks.

knight_helmet.name: Haume de chevalier
knight_helmet.special_effect: Disturbed by the holder ugliness, enemies can't aim well : the holder avoid all critical hits.

diademe.name: Diadème
diademe.special_effect: If several characters hold a Diadème, every holder gets all buffs.

destruction_shield.name: Bouclier de destruction
destruction_shield.special_effect: The shield stacks prevented physical damages. When it reaches 1000, deals half of the damages to all adjacent enemies.

heat_medal.name: Médaillon de Chaleur
heat_medal.special_effect: All adjacent enemies receive 100 magic damages per second.

speed_elias.name: Potion de vivacité d'Elias
speed_elias.special_effect: Every 3 seconds, the holder has a chance to double his attack speed for 3 seconds.

transport.name: Sièges de transport
transport.special_effect: Every 5 seconds, the holder is teleported next to enemies, dealing 200 magic damage to every adjacent enemies.

parchemins.name: Sac de parchemins
parchemins.special_effect: The holder gains mana 2x faster, and casts random spells.

meteo.name: Météo favorable
meteo.special_effect: The meteorological conditions are great... When you deal damages with your spells, it restores mana.

fromage.name: Jet de fromage
fromage.special_effect: Every 5 attacks, the holder cast a powerful spell throwing cheese on his enemies

izanagi.name: Izanagi
izanagi.special_effect: The holder has 30% chances to dodge auto-attacks

graal.name: Saint-Graal
graal.special_effect: Gives the player a second life.
